welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Norton Shores, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muskegon Airport houses ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A provides gates for domestic flights at Muskegon Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B provides gates for international flights at Muskegon Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and chartered flights, the private terminal at Park Township Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
